metadata.name: PARTY LIKE IT'S 1929
metadata.description:
ARTIFICIAL SONG LYRICS:

(VERSE 1)  
I WAS DREAMIN' WHEN I WROTE THIS, ABOUT BANKS IN DISARRAY  
IN THE WORLD OF FINANCE, SOMETIMES THINGS GO ASTRAY  
CREDIT SUISSE AND SILICON VALLEY BANK, THEY'RE FEELING THE HEAT  
MARKETS CRASHING, PANIC SPREADS, NO TIME TO RETREAT

(CHORUS)  
SO TONIGHT WE'RE GONNA TRADE LIKE IT'S 1929  
YES, WE'RE GONNA TRADE, TRADE ALL NIGHT  
TRADE THIS CHAOS AWAY, 'CAUSE IT'S 1929

(VERSE 2)  
2008, WE THOUGHT WE'D LEARNED OUR LESSON WELL  
BUT THE MARKET'S A WILD BEAST, AND ONLY TIME WILL TELL  
SILICON VALLEY BANK, IN TECH THEY TOOK A CHANCE  
CREDIT SUISSE IS REELING TOO, IN THIS PRECARIOUS DANCE

(CHORUS)  
SO TONIGHT WE'RE GONNA TRADE LIKE IT'S 1929  
YES, WE'RE GONNA TRADE, TRADE ALL NIGHT  
TRADE THIS CHAOS AWAY, 'CAUSE IT'S 1929

(BRIDGE)  
EVERYBODY'S WORRIED, WHAT'S THE FUTURE GONNA BRING?  
BUT LIFE'S TOO SHORT, SO LET'S JUST RIDE THIS SWING  
WE'LL TAKE OUR CHANCES, AND TRADE INTO THE NIGHT  
BANK CRASHES COME AND GO, BUT WE'LL BE ALRIGHT

(CHORUS)  
SO TONIGHT WE'RE GONNA TRADE LIKE IT'S 1929  
YES, WE'RE GONNA TRADE, TRADE ALL NIGHT  
TRADE THIS CHAOS AWAY, 'CAUSE IT'S 1929

THESE LYRICS ARE A COMBINATION OF CHATGPT AND ROBNESS V2 COLLABORATING ON A REWORKING OF PRINCE'S SMASH HIT '1999.'  THIS ENTIRE WORK IS ANOTHER INSTALLMENT TO 'THE LAST CONFIRMATION' SERIES, ONE OF THE LONGEST ONGOING CRYPTOART COLLABORATIONS IN WORLD.....STARTING IN DECEMBER 2019.  FOR MORE INFORMATION ON THIS HISTORIC SERIES VISIT WWW.THELASTCONFIRMATION.COM
